apps.name: Played
apps.subtitle: Track your gaming journey
apps.localizedDescription:
Played is your personal game tracker. Add games from IGDB, track what you're playing, manage your backlog, and sync with Google Drive.

Features:
• Search and add games from IGDB database
• Track playing, completed, and backlog games
• See crack status for games
• Create custom game lists
• Export/Import with CSV
• Google Drive backup & sync
• Steam reviews with ratings
• Smart Lists powered by AI
• Conversational AI commands

versions.localizedDescription:
PlayedSync Improvements & Live Activities

• FIX: Local network permissions for PC detection
• NEW: Live Activity shows Now Playing on Lock Screen
• NEW: Playtime tracking stored in game data
• NEW: Playtime included in backups and CSV export
• FIX: Now Playing bar only shows during gameplay
• FIX: Improved Bonjour service discovery
• FIX: Expanded ignore list (400+ non-game apps)

PlayedSync - PC Game Detection

• NEW: PlayedSync server for Windows PC
• NEW: 'Now Playing' bar shows current PC game
• NEW: Auto-detects games from Steam, Epic, GOG
• NEW: Moves Paused/Dropped games to Playing when launched
• NEW: Adds unknown games to Playing library
• NEW: Tracks playtime per session
• NEW: PlayedSync settings section with connection status
• FIXED: Crack status detection now validates game titles
• FIXED: Games without release date now default to Unreleased
• NEW: Offline image caching for covers

UX Improvements & Backup Fixes

• NEW: Instant add/remove games from lists (no extra button)
• IMPROVED: Separated plus/done buttons in list editing
• IMPROVED: Smoother screenshot zoom and pan gestures
• IMPROVED: Better dismiss animation for image viewer
• FIXED: List ranking now starts at #1 correctly
• FIXED: Google/local backup now includes all fields (crackDate, hltbId)
• FIXED: 'Up to date' message when sync has no changes
• NEW: Tracked status for games only in lists/notes

Lists & Search Improvements

• FIXED: List numbering now correct after reordering
• NEW: Add games from IGDB to lists (not just local library)
• NEW: Library/IGDB tabs in Add to List sheet
• IMPROVED: Blue checkmark close buttons throughout
• IMPROVED: Hero blur transition with systemBackground gradient
• IMPROVED: Steam reviews container sizing

MAJOR REFACTOR & CLEANUP

• CODE QUALITY: Massive internal cleanup (SonarCloud code smells fixed)
• FIX: Merged 7+ files with nested logic for better stability
• FIX: Refactored AI logic for cleaner execution
• Same features as 1.6.9, but cleaner engine under the hood.

HOTFIX: Time To Beat UI Update

• CHANGED: Time To Beat now defaults to 0h instead of hiding when data is unavailable
• Includes all 1.6.8 fixes (Sheet Unification, IGDB Endpoint Fix, Native Close Button)

COMPLETE Sheet Unification & UI Polish

• ALL VIEWS now use sheet presentation (pull-to-dismiss everywhere)
• Library: Completed, Dropped, Favorites, All Games - all sheets
• Custom Lists, Smart Lists, Global Search - all sheets
• Playing & Backlog tabs - sheets
• NEW: Standard native Close Button
• FIXED: Time To Beat data loading (using correct IGDB endpoint)
• NEW: Hero blur transition at bottom
• FIXED: Delete/Remove works from any tab
• No more Dynamic Island clipping

UNIFIED Views & Steam Improvements

• FULLY UNIFIED: Library & Discover games now use identical controls
• FIXED: Rating now works for library games opened from Discover
• FIXED: Status pill now clickable in Discover (same as Library)
• FIXED: Unreleased games auto-detected (GTA 6 bug)
• FIXED: IGDB time_to_beat field (was game_time_to_beat)
• IMPROVED: Steam app list with 60s timeout, caching, 3x retry
• IMPROVED: Screenshot centering in fullscreen
• IMPROVED: Sheet pull-to-dismiss restored

Unified Game Details & Critical Fixes

• NEW: Unified GameDetailSheet for Library & Discover views
• FIXED: Screenshot fullscreen showing only blur (root cause: race condition)
• FIXED: Hero header now extends under status bar
• IMPROVED: IGDB time-to-beat data (official API) with HLTB fallback
• IMPROVED: Single AsyncImage prevents blur/image racing

Critical Fixes & UI Restoration

• Fixed: Restored 'Add to Library' buttons in Discover view
• Fixed: Steam 'Invalid App ID' error (improved data resilience)
• Fixed: HLTB search not working (updated request format)
• Improved: Hero animation resilience
• UI: Integrated status controls in hero header

Smarter AI & Visual Polish

• Conversational AI: Greetings, recommendations, game search, time-aware responses
• Hero Header: Clear image at top fading to blur, pull-down to dismiss
• Steam Fix: Reviews now load properly (fixed type mismatch)
• Synced Views: Library and Discover now behave identically
• 11/10 Rating: Special rating option restored
• AI Glass Effect: Liquid glass styling on input and button

UI & Steam Fixes

• Fixed Steam 'data couldn't be read' error with proper error handling
• Fixed Game Detail header overflow issue
• Smart Lists now appear below Library and Lists sections
• AI button now available on all tabs (Discover, Backlog, Playing)
• New conversational AI interface (ChatGPT-like)
• Improved Steam error messages

AI Features & Bug Fixes

• Smart Lists: AI-generated dynamic lists like 'Games to Finish', 'Highly Rated Backlog'
• AI Commands: Tell the app what to do with natural language
• Enhanced Statistics: Completion rate, favorite genre, average rating insights
• Fixed IGDB 'Invalid Response' error
• Fixed Steam Reviews parsing
• Fixed Game Details layout width

Bug Fixes

• Fixed IGDB 'Invalid Response' error on Discover page
• Fixed Steam Reviews 'data couldn't be read' error
• Reduced blur intensity on game detail header
• Improved layout for game title display
• Better error messages for API issues

Game Details Improvements

• Synced UI: Discover and Library now have identical game details
• Premium Steam Reviews: Summary card, emoji ratings, review tabs
• Manual Steam ID: Enter Steam App IDs manually for debugging
• Hero Images: Fixed screenshot enlargement animation
• Haptic Feedback: Tactile feedback throughout the app
• Bug Fixes: Re-add game after removal, removed Paused from add picker

iOS 26 Full Compliance

• Observable: Migrated all services from Combine to Observation framework
• Liquid Glass: Updated to .glassEffect() for iOS 26 design
• Navigation: Migrated all views to FlowStack and LiquidList
• Import UI: Real-time progress with game count and IGDB lookup
• Performance improvements and code modernization
Initial release with custom list integration, Steam reviews fix, auto cover refresh, and pull-to-refresh crack status.
